00090 class EGS_POINT_SOURCE_EXPORT EGS_PointSource : public EGS_BaseSimpleSource {
00091 
00092     EGS_Vector xo;      
00093     bool       valid;   
00094 
00095 public:
00096 
00102     EGS_PointSource(int Q, EGS_BaseSpectrum *Spec, const EGS_Vector &Xo,
00103                     const string &Name="", EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00104         EGS_BaseSimpleSource(Q,Spec,Name,f), xo(Xo), valid(true) {
00105         setUp();
00106     };
00107 
00112     EGS_PointSource(EGS_Input *, EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00113     ~EGS_PointSource() {};
00114 
00115     void getPositionDirection(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm,
00116                               EGS_Vector &x, EGS_Vector &u, EGS_Float &wt) {
00117         x = xo;
00118         u.z = 2*rndm->getUniform()-1;
00119         EGS_Float sinz = 1-u.z*u.z;
00120         if (sinz > 1e-15) {
00121             sinz = sqrt(sinz);
00122             EGS_Float cphi, sphi;
00123             rndm->getAzimuth(cphi,sphi);
00124             u.x = sinz*cphi;
00125             u.y = sinz*sphi;
00126         }
00127         else {
00128             u.x = 0;
00129             u.y = 0;
00130         }
00131         wt = 1;
00132     };
00133 
00134     EGS_Float getFluence() const {
00135         return count;
00136     };
00137 
00138     bool storeFluenceState(ostream &) const {
00139         return true;
00140     };
00141 
00142     bool setFluenceState(istream &) {
00143         return true;
00144     };
00145 
00146     bool isValid() const {
00147         return (valid && s != 0);
00148     };
00149 
00150 protected:
00151 
00153     void setUp();
00154 
00155 };
